metadata.title: CVE-2014-3544 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in user/profile.php in Moodlethrough 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.x before2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 allows remote authenticated users to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via the Skype ID profile field.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
